subject: Baseball
Blacks
Race and Ethnicity
Interscholastic Athletics
Education (K-12)
lead_paragraph: Three current major leaguers graduated from Redan High School, which has an enrollment that is 98 percent black and a baseball program that produces one of the school’s most successful sports teams.
